name: Artania
description: Artania — non-linear post-apocalyptic adventure game in retro-stylistics. During your travel around the post-apocalyptic world by the old locomotive, you will come face-to-face with difficult decisions, which will determine your destiny.
minimum_requirements: 最低: OS: Windows 7 or higher プロセッサー: Intel Core 2 Duo メモリー: 4 GB RAM グラフィック: 1 GB ストレージ: 6 GB 利用可能
